approaches.title: if statements
approaches.blurb: Use a series of if statements and string concatenation.

approaches.title: Loop and f-string
approaches.blurb: Loop through a tuple and assemble output via an f-string.

approaches.title: Sequence(s) with str.join()
approaches.blurb: Use one or more sequences and str.join() with a generator-expression.

approaches.title: Truthy and Falsey Values with f-strings
approaches.blurb: Use ternaries to build words and an f-string to assemble the result.

approaches.title: Dict and str.join()
approaches.blurb: Use a dict to hold factors:values and str.join() with a generator-expression.

approaches.title: itertools.compress
approaches.blurb: Use itertools.compress() with a list mask.
